issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_1::goa: Record people affected by the issue.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_4::goa: Record another important but different example that illustrate the issue and its impact.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_5::goa: Record another important but different example that illustrate the issue and its impact.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_6::goa: Record the effect of the issue. Show how it impacts the community.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_2::goa: Record audio that sums up the the issue and its impact.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_0::goa: Record a location or the community that your issue is about.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_7::goa: Has anything been done about the issue? Record the change.
issue_highlights_audio::text_card_0::tex: If there are more than three, you should add cards to include them.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_7::goa: If nothing has changed, explain that.
issue_highlights_audio::clip_card_3::goa: Record the most important example that illustrates the issue and its impact.
